resources.string: Tim Hortons Inc., commonly nicknamed Tim\'s or Timmies, is a Canadian multinational fast food restaurant chain. Based in Toronto, Tim Hortons serves
Please select some stars and give\nyour feedback
An app that makes you know UBC better
Please provide your reason for\nreporting below
Automatically download attachments for incoming emails
Only download attachments when manually requested
I want to ask about my account settings
How do i change my profile pic?
Where can I delete my account?
This application syncs the profile picture of your Google account, your profile picture here will change if you modify the profile picture of your Google account
Please navigate to the home screen and open the navigation menu on the left. Open the "Settings" tab, and the log out option will be at the very top of the page
Please navigate to the home screen and open the navigation menu on the left. Open the "Settings" tab, and the delete account option will be at the bottom of the page
I want to ask about app settings
Where can I find application settings?
Where can I manually change the application theme?
At what time does the application switch light/dark themes automatically?
Please navigate to the home screen and open the navigation menu on the left, you will see the "Settings" tab
Please navigate to the home screen and open the navigation menu on the left, Open the "Settings" tab, and you can manually choose from light/dark themes in the middle of the page
The light theme will automatically switch on at 8:00 a.m. until 8:00 p.m., and The dark theme will automatically switch on at 8:00 p.m. until 8:00 a.m.
I want to ask about app functionalities
I want to ask about the report system
Where can i report a facility or a review
How long will an user be banned from the app if a report is successful
How long will it take the admin to process my report

For facilities, please navigate to a facility through the home page and scroll to the very bottom of the page for the "Report this Facility" button. For reporting reviews and comments, please navigate to a review/comment of a facility. You will see a "Report" button in the bottom right corner of the review/comment
The user will be banned for 1 week
Usually, the report will be processed within 24 hours, and 2 to 3 days the latest
I want to ask about the review system
Where can i review a facility?
Can I review twice on the same facility?
Can I comment on someone else\’s review?
Please navigate to a facility through the home page, you will see the "Rate" or "Comment" button on the top right of the facility\'s page
Unfortunately, this action is not allowed. Make sure to double check your review before submitting!
Unfortunately, this action is not allowed. But you can show your opinion of a review by upvoting or downvoting it!
I want to ask about the credit system
How much credit will I receive after a successful report?
How much credit will I receive after reviewing a facility?
Will I receive credits for upvoting and downvoting reviews?
Unfortunately, you will not receive credits for upvoting and downvoting. You can get credits from reviewing facilities and reporting facilities/reviews/comments!
